content: This might shock you, but buying a ticket on an airplane does not give you ownership of it any more than at a football game or a movie theater. They can ask you to leave. What is with these knee jerk reactions against police? They were right to remove a man from a place he shouldn’t have been. Did the company perhaps violate their contract with this individual? Almost certainly! That doesn’t mean he has the right to stay on their plane if they ask him to leave.
